hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT a.idAsignatura as id, a.asignatura as asignatura, g.idGrado as idgrado, sy.idSy, a.idArea1 as a1, a.idArea2 as a2, a.idArea3 as a3, a.idSubarea1 as sa1, a.idSubarea2 as sa2, a.idSubarea3 as sa3 FROM Asignatura a INNER JOIN a.grado g INNER JOIN a.sy sy WHERE sy.idSy=:_sy AND g.idGrado=:_grado
DELETE FROM Asignatura a WHERE a.idAsignatura=:idasignatura

query.name: getProcesoMatricula
query.comment: se obtiene el curso para el proceso de matricula o admision en el colegio

hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT _p.idPersona as code, _p.nombre1 as n1, _p.nombre2 as n2, _p.apellido1 as a1, _p.apellido2 as a2, MAX(_curso.idCurso) as idcurso, MAX(_curso.curso) as curse, MAX(_sy.idSy) as maximo_sy FROM InscAlumCurso _ia INNER JOIN _ia.persona as _p INNER JOIN _ia.sy as _sy INNER JOIN _ia.curso as _curso WHERE _p.idPersona=:idp AND (_curso.idCurso < 10101 OR _curso.idCurso > 40403) GROUP BY _p.idPersona ORDER BY _curso.idCurso desc

query.name: HQLlsCursos
query.comment: listado de cursos sin adminisiones ni matriculas

hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT c.idCurso as id, c.curso as curso, g.idGrado as idgrado FROM Grado g INNER JOIN g.cursos c WHERE c.idCurso >= 10101 and c.idCurso <= 40403 AND g.idGrado=:idg
select nombre1 AS nombre1, nombre2 AS nombre2 , apellido1 AS apellido1, apellido2 AS apellido2, idPersona AS idp, clave AS clave, nombreLdap as user from Persona _p where _p.nombreLdap=:usuario
SELECT MAX(a.idAsignatura) as maxValue, (MAX(a.idAsignatura)+1) as newId FROM Asignatura a INNER JOIN a.sy sy INNER JOIN a.grado g WHERE g.idGrado=:idgrado AND sy.idSy=:idsy

hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT a.idAsignatura as id, a.asignatura as asignatura, a.subject as subject, a.electiva as electiva, a.idArea1 as a1, a.idArea2 as a2, a.idArea3 as a3, a.idSubarea1 as sa1, a.idSubarea2 as sa2, a.idSubarea3 as sa3, g.idGrado as idgrado, sy.idSy as sy, tia.idTipoInscAsig as idTipoInscAsig, a.salonIdSalon as salon, a.descripAsigEspaniol as descripcion_espanol, a.descripAsigIngles as descripcion_ingles, a.meses as meses, a.ihA1 as iha1, a.ihA2 as iha2, a.ihA3 as iha3, a.intensidadHoraria as ihtotal, a.esperadostotal as esperadosTotal, a.peso as peso FROM Asignatura a INNER JOIN a.grado g INNER JOIN a.sy sy INNER JOIN a.tipoInscAsig tia WHERE a.idAsignatura=:idasignatura
